comment: Human-readable name of the OMOP CDM database instance.

description: Organization or entity that holds the CDM instance.
comment: Institution responsible for maintaining the CDM.
Narrative description of the data source and transformation context.

description: Date the data was extracted from the source system.

description: Date the ETL process was completed.

description: Version of the OMOP Standardized Vocabularies used.
